name: Наружу
description:
Waking up one afternoon after a restless sleep, Yegor Zimin discovered that he...

- In a quest room, dude! Rooms by key stages of your life, you know?

His life is a series of tragic events and incredible opportunities. The orphan from the children's militia room was the first in the world to go through a personality "tune-up" program. Now he is always polite, collected, judicious. Soft, indecisive, and weak-willed.

An example to the whole country!

How does one cope with his own dark past, corporate wars and flirtatious mechanical mouse?

Well.

- You'll freak out, I promise.

Features:

  • alternate post-Soviet setting from 1990-2010, rendered through authentic and nostalgic locations
  • classical combination of puzzles and walking simulator with horror elements
  • оriginal soundtrack by great electronic duo
  • family and corporate drama in the voices of theater and movie professionals
